```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Problem 1

First, let's clean the data in pols-month.csv

```{r}
pols_df =
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv", na = c("NA", ".", "")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(
    mon, into = c("year", "month", "day")
  ) |>
  mutate(month = case_match(
    month,
    "01" ~ "January", 
    "02" ~ "February",
    "03" ~ "March",
    "04" ~ "April", 
    "05" ~ "May",
    "06" ~ "June",
    "07" ~ "July", 
    "08" ~ "August",
    "09" ~ "September",
    "10" ~ "October",
    "11" ~ "November",
    "12" ~ "December"
  )) |>
  mutate(president = case_when(
    prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop",
    prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem"
  )) |>
  select(-c(prez_gop, prez_dem, day))
```
